name: Photosynthesis Experiment - ContentsDa Science Experiment
summary:
lift the bottle of BTB solution
add BTB solution to 3 empty glass bottles
go to the lake and catch a black horse
put the black horse into the 2 vials of BTB solution
close the lids of the vials with BTB solution
cover one of the vials of BTB solution with the black horse with a black tin to prevent sunlight from getting through
observe the changes that occur after a day or so
remove the black tub
observe three bottles of BTB solution alone and three bottles of BTB solution with black horse, one covered...
